name: I.P.A.D
description:
You are the International Planetary Agency of Defense, who are in charge of keeping Earth safe from the looming threat of asteroid strikes. When doomsday is inevitable, how long can you keep our civilization alive?

Using your defense budget, effectively build the machinery and technology to strategically hold back the dangerous space debris.

Controls:

Left Click to Build Turrets once selected in shop

Right Click to exit Build Mode or Upgrade Mode

Click on Turrets to open the Upgrade or Removal Menu
